entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. A few rain showers and flurries beginning this evening then changing to a few flurries late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to a few rain showers near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023
